post:
Hello LET!  
  
TNAHosting is happy to bring a couple deals in our offer post this time around.  
  
  
**6GB OpenVZ**  
* 1 IPv4 [IPv6 available]  
* 2x vCPU  
* 200GB HDD  
* 2TB Bandwidth  
* $5/m - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=54)  
  
  
**Dual L5420**  
* 2x L5420 – 8 cores @ 2.5GHz  
* 24GB DDR2 RAM  
* 500GB HDD  
* 5TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* Dedicated IPMI  
* /29 IPv4 [IPv6 available]      
* $29/m – [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=51)  
  
  
Virtual servers are setup instantly after payment, dedicated servers will be setup in 1-3 days.  
  
Looking Glass: http://lg.chi.tnahosting.net/  
  
We accept PayPal, Major Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), and Bitcoin.  
  
Have questions or need something custom? Feel free to PM me or open a [sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2).
